#summary setXXX(...)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, see [update update()] for more info. Replace `XXX` with the name of an association you have set up through [hasOne hasOne()].

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- a "hasOne" association from "author" to "bio" is required --->
<cfset anAuthor = model("author").findByKey(params.authorId)>
<cfset aBio = model("bio").findByKey(params.bioId)>

<cfset anAuthor.setBio(aBio)>
=
<cfset model("bio").update(authorId=params.authorId)>
}}}
